content: Yes, Party in the Paddock has various sustainability initiatives in place. One of their main sustainability initiatives is the "Leave No Trace" policy, which encourages festival-goers to clean up after themselves and leave the festival site as it was found. The festival also has a recycling program, and they work with local vendors to use biodegradable, compostable or recyclable food packaging. Additionally, a free shuttle bus service is provided to encourage carpooling, the festival also provides an area for bicycle parking as an alternative way to arrive at the festival. The organizers are continually finding ways to improve their sustainability practices, and they encourage attendees to participate in reducing environmental impact.
